p: The effect of thermal annealing on the change in magnetic characteristics of investigated nanoparticles was conducted applying Mossbauer spectroscopy approach. The dynamics of changes in Mossbauer spectra is shown in Figure 6. The determination of texture parameters was conducted based on the analysis of MÃ¶ssbauer spectra [ 37, 43]. That enables us to estimate parameters correlations, as well as the range of their alterations.
